#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
main()
{
	std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	ll n,m,i,count;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		count=0;
		cin>>n;
		ll a[n];
		cin>>a[0];
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
		cin>>a[i];
		if(a[i-1]!=a[i])
		{
			count++;
			}	
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
	}
}
